headline: What Paycom Software (PAYC)'s Mixed Q3 Results and CFO Share Sale Mean For Shareholders
summary: Paycom Software recently reported third-quarter 2025 results that slightly missed earnings-per-share expectations but beat revenue forecasts, while CFO Robert D. Foster sold 1,300 shares for about US$211,458 on December 10, 2025. Analyst commentary has emphasized that Paycom’s guidance for the fourth quarter points to modestly faster sequential revenue growth, drawing attention to how its business momentum and executive share sales may shape investor perceptions. We’ll now examine how...

headline: Paycom (PAYC): Reassessing Valuation After a 25% Three-Month Share Price Drop
summary: Recent performance and investor backdrop Paycom Software (PAYC) has had a rough stretch, with the stock down about 25% over the past 3 months and nearly 30% over the past year, despite steady high single digit revenue and profit growth. See our latest analysis for Paycom Software. The recent pullback reflects investors recalibrating expectations after several years of strong gains. The latest 90 day share price return of negative 25.16 percent contrasts sharply with Paycom Software's longer...

headline: Ohio State’s Caleb Downs Named 2025 Paycom Jim Thorpe Award Winner
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, December 13, 2025--As the leader of the No. 1 defense in the country, Ohio State University’s Caleb Downs has been named the 2025 Paycom Jim Thorpe Award Winner. The announcement was made live tonight on The Home Depot College Football Awards on ESPN. Downs received the 2025 honor – given to the top defensive back in college football based on performance on the field, athletic ability and character – on behalf of the Oklahoma Sports Hall of Fame, Jim Thorpe Association and present
